summary:
### May 2025 Summary for geodelabs/ethereum-job-board

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Implemented SEO-friendly URL slugs for companies and jobs, enhancing user experience and searchability.
  - Added contact details to job submissions, improving communication for job postings.
  - Developed a company detail page that lists all associated jobs, providing better navigation for users.
  - Introduced a new "Apply Now" button, streamlining the application process.
  - Implemented tracking features for better analytics.

- **Closed Issues:**
  - Resolved issues related to URL slugs and contact details for job postings.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on enhancing user experience through improved navigation and communication features.
  - Emphasis on SEO and tracking capabilities to support better visibility and data collection.

topIssues.title: URL slugs for companies and jobs
Add contact details to jobSubmissions and jobs

topPRs.title: use slug for companies and jobs
Company detail page listing all the jobs
